scenario_text.value:
We’ll do what we have to either way, but if
we beat them, will you help us out?
No problem! We’ll pay you back for saving us!

I’m so scared!
I hate pain!

Relax. We’ll make it better. And if we do,
will you help us in return?

Absolutely!
Help me and I’ll do anything!
When the fighting ends, will you help us?

I guess so. But do you promise to always
protect me?

So many demands! Okay, okay.
I’ll protect you!
